MODS:titleInfo.MODS:title: Margaret B.S. Clapham Spinks house (Pasadena, Calif.)

Interior elevations and sections -- north, east, south and west elevations of kitchen ; south and east elevations of linen room ; north, west, south and east elevations of pantry ; north, east, south and west elevations of cold room ; front and side elevations of mantel in drawing room ; elev., section and plan of vent for typical closet ; elevations of mantels in living room & bedroom no. 2 ; north elevation of dining room ; south elevation of living room ; south and west elevations of upper and lower halls with elevation and section of lower part of stairs :Â Sheet no. 9,
